summary: Aliens help a feisty old New York couple in their battle against the ruthless land developer who's out to evict them.
cast: Hume Cronyn|Jessica Tandy|Frank McRae|Elizabeth Peña|Michael Carmine|Dennis Boutsikaris|Tom Aldredge|Jane Hoffman|John DiSanti|John Pankow|MacIntyre Dixon|Michael Greene|Doris Belack|Wendy Schaal|José Angel Santana|James Le Gros|Ronald L. Schwary|Susan Shoffner|Shelly Kurtz|Joe Hamer|H. Clay Dear|Howard Renensland|Judy Grafe|Alice Beardsley|Dick Martinsen|Charles Raymond|Riki Colon|Jon Imparato|David Vasquez|John Arceri|Lorenzo Gaspar|Luis Guzmán|Nik Tyler|Ellen Whyte
title: Nuestros maravillosos aliados
